issue.title: Clean up the Test Double generator and runtime

labels.name: type/refactoring
labels.description: A refactoring that should be applied to make the code easier to understand and maintain

issue.body: This closes #5246, #5247, #5248, #5249, #5250, #5310, #5311, #5312, #5313, #5314, #5316, #5321, #5416, #5424, and #5536 as well as deletes now unused code and simplifies existing code.

issue.title: Improve error message if an abstract class is mocked in PHPUnit 12

repository.name: Stub
repository.description: Flexible Stub wrapper for PHPUnit's Mock Builder

issue.body:
PHPUnit 12 removed the possibility to mock abstract classes (https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/5314)

I noticed a quite cryptic error message if I try to mock an abstract class:
>  call_user_func_array(): Argument #1 ($callback) must be a valid callback, class PHPUnit\Framework\MockObject\Generator\Generator does not have a method "mockObjectForAbstractClass"

With this PR the error message will be "PHPUnit 12 or greater does not allow to mock abstract classes anymore".
